x_symbol.license: Part of X, a Cross-Browser Javascript Library, Distributed under the terms of the GNU LGPL
x_symbol.description: Access each element of a collection sequentially (by its numeric index) and do something with it.

par.name: f
par.note: Func - Function to execute for each element. Arguments: item, index, number of items

par.name: s
par.note: Start index. A number between 0 and collection size - 1. (optional)
